# idOS JavaScript SDK for server dApps.

[![NPM](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/@idos-network/idos-sdk?logo=npm)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@idos-network/idos-sdk) ![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-blue?&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)

## Installation

Get [our NPM package](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@idos-network/idos-sdk) and its dependencies with pnpm or the equivalent of your package manager of choice:
```
pnpm add @idos-network/idos-sdk-server-dapp ethers near-api-js
```

## Quickstart.

Import the SDK and initialize it:

```js
import { idOS } from "@idos-network/idos-sdk-server-dapp";

export const sdk = await idOS.init(...options);
```


### Listing grants.

```js
import {sdk} from './idOS'

const grants = await sdk.listGrants({
  owner: ""0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000"
})
```

### Fetching a shared credential.

```js
// Import the initialised sdk instance.
import {sdk} from './idOS'

const grants = await sdk.fetchSharedCredential('ID')
```
